verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* Adonisedec \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* wit, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Josue \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* Hai, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* destroyed \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, (\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Hai, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,) \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Gabaonites \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w gone|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* confederates,

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* Gabaon \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4467"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Hai, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* fighting \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w most|strong="H4480"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* Adonisedec \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Oham \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Pharam \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Jerimoth, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Japhia|strong="H3309"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Lachis, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Dabir \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3091"\w* Josue \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Galgal, \w and|strong="H3091"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w warriors|strong="H1368"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w most|strong="H4480"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josue: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* Josue \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Galgal \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*.
